Headline: Temporary #7 Harrison Reroute near Damen/Polk.
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted near Damen/Polk.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Damen/Polk.

Eastbound buses will operate via Harrison, Western, Jackson, Loomis, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Western buses will operate via Harrison, Loomis, Van Buren, Western, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Southbound #29 State Reroute near State/63rd
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted near State/63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 63rd, King Drive, 67th, State, and resume normal route due to  street blockage near State/63rd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Westbound #155 Devon Reroute near Devon/Broadway
ShortDescription: Westbound 155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted near Devon/Broadway.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted via Devon, Western, Pratt, California, Devon, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Devon/Broadway.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
